paragraph: Manpei Takagi (高木 万平, Takagi Manpei) is a Japanese former actor and model from Seto, Aichi. He is best known for portraying Retsu Fukami/Geki Blue in the Super Sentai series Juken Sentai Gekiranger. He is the twin brother of actor Shinpei Takagi.
Official profile at Stardust Promotion (in Japanese)
